com.smartnsoft.droid4me.graphics.drawable

Class BasicBitmapDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.graphics.drawable.BasicBitmapDrawable

  • public final class BasicBitmapDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    A very basic bitmap drawable which displays the image just like it is. It is translucent. Inspired from the Shelves application at http://shelves.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Shelves/src/org/curiouscreature/android/shelves/drawable/FastBitmapDrawable.java.
    Since:
    2010.02.24
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier
